participant_1.background:
My most valuable thing is my ability to stay humble, even in the face of great wealth.
i play bingo every wednesday with my husband.
i am a civil war reenactment participant.
yellow is my favorite color.
I am a creative person who enjoys making jewelry.

participant_2.background:
I have never been in a relationship because I prefer to spend my time with my cars.
I need to find a way to advertise my juicing bar to people in my neighborhood.
I sometimes have problems with my coordination, but I'm working on it.
My family is supportive of my art career and helps me out when I need it.
i am divorced and looking to date.

content.text: Hello!
Hi there!
What are you up to today?
Not much, just working on some art and thinking about how to advertise my juicing bar.
That's cool! I'm a creative person too, I like to make jewelry.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to learn how to make jewelry.
It's really easy to get started! There are a lot of great tutorials online.
I'll have to check that out!
What kind of art do you like to make?
I like to paint and draw, mostly landscapes.
That's beautiful! I love landscapes.
Thanks! I'm glad you like it.
What are your hobbies?
I love to play bingo and I'm a civil war reenactment participant.
Bingo! That's a classic. I'm not sure what a civil war reenactment is.
It's when people dress up in civil war clothes and act out battles.
That sounds really cool! I'm not sure I'd be brave enough to do that.
It's not as scary as it sounds! It's a lot of fun.
Well, it sounds like you have a lot of interesting hobbies.
Thanks! I like to keep busy.
Me too! I'm always looking for new things to do
